title: Any one know this script type font?
content:
Any one know this script type font? Atleast similar name.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821125331im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/118992_Pancake%20House_3702.jpg)

 [‹ (Probably) easy serif face from the Breakfast at Tiffany's book](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821125331/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47068 "Go to previous forum topic") [Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821125331/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47018 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content: It looks handdrawn (see the two different ‘i’).
ANY SIMILAR FONT FOR THIS AVILABLE? SO I CAN DRAW IT WITH THE GETTING IDEA OF SHAPING OF THAT SIMILAR FONT.

Try Sudtipos. They have some great script fonts, or letterhead fonts too.

[http://www.sudtipos.com/home](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821125331/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home "http://www.sudtipos.com/home")

[http://www.letterheadfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821125331/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/")

JH

Another suggestion is to look in [Part 7 of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821125331/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html) and see what you think looks similar. Use the Reference List to locate a supplier.

- Mike Yanega
